devdoc.details: The main objective of this contract is to avoid storing contract addresses in our protocols which requires 160 bits of storage      Instead, we can just store the nonce & deployment of this address to calculate the address realtime using "AddressCalcs" library

params.addr: The address of the deployed contract

params.count: The new count for the deployer

params.owner_: The address of the contract owner

deployContract(bytes).details: Decrements the deployer's allowed deployments count if not the owner

params.contractCode_: The bytecode of the contract to deploy

returns.contractAddress_: The address of the deployed contract

params.nonce_: The nonce to use for address calculation

updateDeployer(address,uint16).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.count_: The new count for the deployer

devdoc.title: FluidContractFactory

FluidContractFactory__InvalidOperation().notice: Thrown when an invalid operation is attempted

LogContractDeployed(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new contract is deployed

LogUpdateDeployer(address,uint16).notice: Emitted when a deployer's count is updated

deployer(address).notice: Mapping to store the deployment count for each deployer

getContractAddress(uint256).notice: Calculates the address of a contract for a given nonce

updateDeployer(address,uint16).notice: Updates the allowed deployments count for a specific deployer

userdoc.notice: A contract that allows deployers to deploy any contract by passing the contract data in bytes
